article_title: Medicare Seniors Like ObamaCare's Team Approach

article_metadata.description: As the U.S. health care system moves away from fee-for-service medicine to more accountable care that uses a teamof health professionals, seniors covered by Medicare say they are okay with these new models that include nurses, social workers and other allied health professionals in the front lines of their treatment, according [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
